## Plotting Map

Below map shows the Gediminas Castle in Lithuania.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(lat=54.6867, lng=25.2907, 
           popup="Gediminas Castle")
my_map
```
